Description.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT
Description.ExtendedDescription: Strategy for the calculation of soil temperature with SWAT method. Reference: Neitsch, S.L., Arnold, J.G., Kiniry, J.R., Williams, J.R., King, K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool. Theoretical documentation. Version 2000. http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf
Description.ShortDescription: Calculates soil temperature by layer using the SWAT damping-depth approach with a daily lag coefficient.

Input.name: states_LayerThickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness for each layer (m)

Input.name: LagCoefficient
Input.description: Lag coefficient controlling influence of previous day's temperature (dimensionless)

Input.name: states_SoilTemperatureByLayers
Input.description: Previous soil temperature of each layer

Input.name: states_VolumetricWaterContent
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content for each layer

Output.name: states1_SoilTemperatureByLayers
Output.description: Updated soil temperature of each layer
